releases.title: Linearly Variable Loads & Dimensions
highlights: Added support for linearly variable loads on elements.
Fixed the ability to add, delete, and select dimensions between nodes.
Dimensions can be moved with the mouse for better clarity.

media.alt: Linearly variable loads - positive and negative
media.caption: Linearly variable loads - positive and negative

releases.title: Load stacking to improve visibility
highlights: Distributed loads now stack correctly when multiple placed on the same element.
Nodal loads in the same direction now stack on top of each other to improve visibility.

releases.title: Changelog
highlights: Changelog dialog now shows on app updates with useful release information.
Supports multiple languages based on user locale.
